intro: Zehneria ridens, commonly known as the silver spider plant, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Araceae and is characterized by its striking, arrow-shaped leaves that are often variegated with silver and green. The plant produces small, white, spadix-like flowers surrounded by a green spathe. It is a popular ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and relatively easy care requirements. Zehneria ridens thrives in bright, indirect light and prefers moist, well-draining soil.
